Developer Terms of Use
des:
With G Smart and Alexa you can complete controls your devices by voice.

Please link your G Smart account first. Use the following steps to controls your devices by this skill:
1. Purchase Amazon speakers, register an account with the Amazon "Alexa" application and bind the speaker device;
2. Download the "G Smart" application and register an account with it;
3. Bind your devices with "G Smart" application and set its name;
4. Search for the "G Smart" skill from the "Alexa" application and select the correct account registration area for authorized login;
5. Perform device discovery operations through the device page of the "Alexa" application.

You can control your device with the following simple statements:
Switch/Outlet Category:
 - Alexa, turn on <device name>.
 - Alexa, turn off <device name>.
For example: 
 - Alexa, turn on the bedroom switch.
 - Alexa, turn off the bedroom switch.

Light Category:
 - Alexa, turn on <device name>.
 - Alexa, turn off <device name>.
 - Alexa, set <device name> to <brightness value> percent.
 - Alexa, brighten <device_name>.
 - Alexa, dim <device_name>.
 - Alexa, set <device_name> to <color name>.
 - Alexa, set <device_name> to <color temperature name>.
For example: 
 - Alexa, set the bedroom light to 80 percent.
 - Alexa, set the bedroom light to white.

If you have any questions, please contact us with email gizwits_echo@gizwits.com for further assistance.
